projectGridLines.title: Digital Marketing Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

As a Digital Marketing Analyst, you will play a crucial role in managing and executing our

digital marketing activities. You will ensure that our digital presence is aligned with our

brand strategy and objectives. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience

in the dynamic field of venture capital and digital marketing

Key Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement digital marketing strategies across various platforms, including

social media, email marketing, and content marketing.

- Assist in the curation of content for our website, blog, and posts on social media channels.

- Manage the website in terms of regular updations and content additions.

- Monitor and analyze digital marketing metrics to assess the effectiveness of campaigns

and suggest improvements.

- Coordinate with various team members to ensure timely execution of outputs such as

blogs, research reports etc.

- Scheduling and executing podcasting activities in collaboration with our founders and the

marketing agency.

- Support in the development of marketing materials, presentations, and reports.

- Work closely with our portfolio founders or their marketing POCs to track their digital

marketing initiatives

PLEASE NOTE THIS IS NOT AN INVESTMENT ROLE

Skill sets:

- Strong innate curiosity & passion towards Marketing, Communications & the Indian

startup ecosystem

- Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, SEM, social media

marketing, and content marketing.

- Excellent communication and writing skills.

- Proficiency in using digital marketing tools and platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, social

media management tools, email marketing software).

- Creative mindset with the ability to generate new ideas and approaches.

- Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks and deadlines.

Traits expectation:

- Ethical, meticulous, creative, deep interest in Indian Startup Ecosystem, self-motivated

Expected learning:

- Digital strategy development

- Content creation and curation

- Website management

- Analytics and performance tracking

- Cross-functional collaboration

- Marketing collateral development
